notes:
üì¢ Update: Stylish Action HUD v1.1 (Early Access)

‚ú® New Features
* **UI & Layout:** Added Themed Collapse Button (matches active theme) and Individual Card Sizing (Width/Height).
* **GM Tools:** Enhanced HUD hiding for specific tokens and 'Secret Attributes' (GM-only visibility) for resource tracking.
* **Resource Tracking 2.0:** New display styles (Numeric/Text) and support for Custom Icons (FontAwesome/Images).
* **System Enhancements:** [PF2e] Feats separation, expanded tracking (Speed, Hero Points, AC, Temp HP), and Spell DC display. [D&D 5e] Spell DC display.

üêõ Bug Fixes
* **Macros:** Fixed Compendium macro execution issues.
* **Themes:** Fixed X/Y coordinate bugs in Glass, Fantasy, Cyberpunk, and Medieval themes.
* **Settings:** Global settings no longer overwrite personal positioning overrides.

announcement.title: v1.1 Massive Update: Customization & GM Control
announcement.content: New themed collapse buttons, individual card sizing, secret GM attributes, and enhanced PF2e/D&D5e support are now live!
